oh- before the stream today- Mihari and i completed the weekly bounties for MHW in under an hour XD
I don't play the game so I don't know if that's fast or not
playing Duo's is one of the hardest ways to play the game- and we had to do 4 tempered (harder than normal) Azure Rathalos'
Monsters in MHW get 2.6x more HP when you do multiplayer regardless of how many players of the max 4- so by adding one player its just as hard as if you had 4 players
so the easiest way to play is Solo
but that one's hard to set up
4 isnt as easy because they also gain higher resistances to things like stun and statuses
ah yeah, i forgot tempered monsters build resisatnce to stuff like that
so with the right build i can almost stun lock a monster if i play it just right
and with the lower HP its super easy to finish em quick- im not a speed runner but i killed a Tempered Teostra in 4:25
Tempered ones only build resistance to flashes and screamers- and im not actually sure about screamers - i dont fight enough tempered Diablos' to try
ah, yeah, I was thinking of flash bombs mainly
because I played with a friend and we were trying to fight an tempered rathalos but eventually we couldn't down it
which was awful for us since I'm a hammer main and she was an GS main, haha
we eventually got it, but, yeah.
i use almost all the weapons but i love the bow in MHW
i like it too! hammer's my favorite though, and I love bowgun too
i'm not a very good player; I'm more of just casual, but it's a really fun game
only weapons i havent used a lot now are - Insect Glaive, Longsword, and Hunting horn
I have one weapon I have never touched so far.
gunlance in MHW kinda sucks though
Now THAT I can't really argue...
the only part that is fun is when the monster gets knocked out or over or slept and you get to use the wyvern fire on its face
however- the Deviljho lance with full guard and guard up- is god tier - invulnerable and deadly- and fast- sorta XD
they have a mod so when you do the lance charge it played that song from Initial D
Mods are awesome btw- so long as you arent using cheat mods and just using visual mods
Mihari and I have been hunting wearing the Halloween Handler Dress
"That song from Initial D" which one lol
yeah, visual ones are great. i'm just worried about possibly getting banned so I stopped using the one that changed the button images to the ps4 ones
Yeah Deja vu is probably one of the most popular songs from that anime.
they are very very very unlikely to ban anyone for using visual mods because they only work for those who have the mod
yeah, it's just still an concern :S
but if you have a mod that changes your damage - or modifies a weapon to say- FIRE INFINITELY
cept they have never banned anyone yet
i'm thinking of one that like, shows you damage stuff? my friend had that too, it helped her capture things better
it didn't change anything, and only she could see it/use it
neato, I might have to grab that then, because I have a hard time telling if I can capture monsters yet or not or if I'm doing good at helping her take down stuff
those are all gonna be client-sided probably. The only affect your game, and they don't send any information to the game servers you're playing on.
yeah. But things like... the transmog, would, yeah?
the mods that change damage or speed or whatnot, those would send information to the servers, and that's what the company will be watching for.
what you see will be only changed to you. Noone else would see it
everyone that's within reach of it*
though I'm sure that'd be noticed super quick xD

anyone know what the natural enemy of a Mime is?
I don't think I even want to look up the answer.
we had to fight one in a Super hero game a couple weeks ago
my character is the type to try and come up with clever ways to counter an enemies abilities
but i was at a loss as to what the natural weakness or enemy of a mime was
As long as nobody looks at him, he cant hurt you!
his actual ability was to project force and teleport- so he could trap you in a box of force or pretend to open a door and teleport through it
he could create telekinetic forces and shot someone with his finger
that sounds like an awesome enemy :D
all I get are zombies in a cagefight :D
i defeated him but i was disappointed i couldnt come up with a more legit counter
I was expecting some kind of bad pun joke
was not expecting legit serious question lol
expose him as a fraud in front of a crowd?
i used intangibility and super speed to avoid his invisible walls- and popped out of the ground beneath him - upper cutted him right in the balls at mach 2
basically all I can think is beeing REALLY mean and talk him down on a personal level.
If you trick him into talking, he loses all his power
so sage.. did he say anything?
or did he crumple over as expected?
he didnt make a sound- its possible he didnt have a voice box at all
Goodnight everyone, oh and the powderpuff girls solution to defeating a mime is rock music.
he flew 35 feet into the air though
I mean, he could be the type of person that doesn't make a noise when they get seriously injured
those ppl are fairly bad to keep around.. they don't drop noise flags if something bad happens.
..and I am one of those people. :ptv-uneasy:
the first villain we fought used sonic attacks and barriers
*Takes Sage's advice and rides cart to bed.* o3o
so i got some giant speakers and set them up around him- and reversed the frequency on him
ah yeah I remember you telling us about that
this past week we had to deal with a really powerful shadow creature
he almost took out half the party so i went with my strongest non physical attack- and generated a bolt of lightning

problem was he had been absorbing all the attacks that came at him before- so i assumed he absorbed physical damage- so i tried an energy- he absorbed that too- but not all of it- so it really hurt him
but he launched it back at me too- i had to use a soak to avoid the damage
from then on it was just about holding him off till help could arrive
finally one of the top tier heroes showed up on scene to finish him off
it was a little weird because it felt like i was the only one doing anything- but thats probably because i built my character to be high utility- and i can use tricks to pull off huge damage moves
